## Http2Server class

HTTP/2 Server implementation using template method pattern 继承BaseServer，只实现HTTP/2特定的逻辑

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Http2Server extends BaseServer<Http2ServerOptions> 
```
**Extends:** BaseServer&lt;Http2ServerOptions&gt;
